amendatorysection.catchline: Fund; education of chief instructors; conditions; costs; reimbursement.
amendatorysection.para: Until there are three chief instructors teaching a motorcycle safety instructor preparation course, the department shall expend amounts in the fund pursuant to the priorities provided in section 60-2133 for persons training to become chief instructors. The reimbursement shall be conditioned on the recipient agreeing to teach a motorcycle safety instructor preparation course, once chief instructor status is achieved, at least once per year for two years in any one of the three congressional districts as assigned by the director. The director shall assign the chief instructors so that the motorcycle safety instructor preparation course is taught in each of the three congressional districts. The reimbursement shall cover (1) the full cost of tuition and (2) up to two thousand dollars of actual, documented transportation and living expenses if the training is successfully completed.
